name: Celery, Watermelon and Cucumber Salad
recipeIngredient: 2 cups 1-inch pieces cubed and seeded watermelon
1 cup 1-inch pieces cubed, peeled and seeded cucumber
Interior leaves from celery heart, roughly chopped
3 ounces crumbled sheep's-milk feta or other feta

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium bowl, combine the celery, watermelon, cucumber, celery leaves and salt. If desired, season with a squeeze of lemon juice to taste. Toss to mix, cover and refrigerate, 2 to 3 hours.
Place equal portions on each of 4 plates. Top with feta and serve.
